archimate:ApplicationFunction.name: [local] Application Function
archimate:ApplicationFunction.documentation:
Archimate 3: http://pubs.opengroup.org/architecture/archimate3-doc/chap09.html#_Toc302490427 An application function represents automated behavior that can be performed by an application component.
Smileham: An internal function of the application, e.g. Authentication, Schedule Timetable, Transcode
